name: 2 Player 1 Keyboard Tanks
description:
Left player: move with W,A,S and D, fire with SPACE.

Right player: move with ARROW keys, fire with ENTER.

The longer you hold fire (SPACE or ENTER) the farther you shoot.

If controls are not working, click once with your mouse inside the game window.

This project was made with UNITY TECHNOLOGIES assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/tanks-tutoria...
